posts.title: City College student arrested
posts.description:
A City College student was arrested after he threatened to “shoot up” the Upper Manhattan school, sources said.

A public safety official at CCNY sent out an email to students warning them that Din Bajrektarevic, 21, posted his violent plans to social media Nov. 23, the email reads.
posts.author: students

posts.title: Bajrektarevic was also suspended from the school as
posts.description: Morena cautioned students to remain alert as Bajrektarevic awaits his next court date Jan. 11. Along with the memo, the public safety official attached a photo of Bajrektarevic.
posts.author: author
